name: Expelemalum
description:
Video of the game: https://youtu.be/wicoaZ6kP_c

A small curse is sent to a small village by the devil to disrupt villagers as much as possible. Exorcists will try to exorcise you even if some villagers may be killed.

Hoppefully you can turn villagers to Werewolfs so they can kill every exhorcists and make you a free curse.

Content Warning

Reference to death and religion (fictive)

Credits

Coding,  Art,  Audio,  Design : Nathan Bernand, Remi Monthiller and Samuel Terras-Viola

church bell SFX : sinewave1kHz from freesound

bacon crackling SFX : TheAcidRomance from freesound

Avara Font : Raphaël Bastide, weiweihuanghuang, Lucas Le Bihan from fontlibrary

Medieval_winter (Teaser) : TEKNOAXE 

Expelemalum was made for the fifty-fourth Godot Wild Jam.
